name: Cilantro Pesto
description: Made from fresh cilantro, cotija cheese, slivered almonds, red onions, garlic, olive oil and lime juice, this pesto sauce is the perfect topping for just about everything from grilled meats, seafood, as a sandwich spread, and mixed into pasta.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a food processor or blender and pulse until mostly smooth.

recipeIngredient: <val>1/3</val> cup cotija cheese (or freshely grated parmesan)
